original_text: Jesus said, ‘The kingdom of heaven is also like a man who began a journey. Before the master went away, he told his servants to come to him. He said to them, “Take care of all my money and all my things for me.”
korean_text: 또 어떤 사람이 타국에 갈 때 그 종들을 불러 자기 소유를 맡김과 같으니

sentences.original_text: The kingdom of heaven is also like a man
sentences.korean_translation: 하늘 나라는 또 어떤 사람과 같으니

sentences.original_text: he told his servants to come to him.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자기 종들에게 자기에게 오라고 말했다.

sentences.original_text: Take care of all my money
and all my things for me.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나의 모든 물건도 나를 위해 돌보아라.
